Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]Absent from [Aadd7]flesh, O b[C]lissful th[D]ought What [G]joy this [D]moment br[A]ings [A]Freed from the [Aadd7]blame my [C]sin has br[D]ought, From [G]pain and d[D]eath and its st[A]ing. [Aadd7]
Verse 2: [A]Absent from [Aadd7]flesh, O Gl[C]orious d[D]ay! In [G]one tri[D]umphant str[A]oke My [A]reckoning [Aadd7]paid, my ch[C]arges dr[D]opped and the [G]bonds 'round my [D]hands are [A]broke. [Aadd7]
CHORUS: I [G]go where [D]God and g[A]lory shine, To [G]one et[D]ernal [A]day This f[G]ailing b[D]ody I [A]now resign, For the [G]angels p[D]oint my [A]way. For the [G]angels p[D]oint my [A]way.
Verse 3: [A]Absent from [Aadd7]flesh! then [C]rise, my s[D]oul, Where [G]feet nor w[D]ings could [A]climb, Bey[A]ond the [Aadd7]sky, where p[C]lanets r[D]oll, And be[G]yond all [D]keep of [A]time. [Aadd7]
